definitions.description: Entity which lists the most common greenhouse gases and their quantities as output of calculation or direct measurement.

constantValues: Entity which lists the most common greenhouse gases and their quantities as output of calculation or direct measurement.

members.name: emissionId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances

members.name: TTLInSeconds
members.description: Time to live in seconds.

members.name: partitionId
members.description: Logical partition id. A logical partition consists of a set of records with same partition id.

constantValues: Logical partition id. A logical partition consists of a set of records with same partition id.

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: importSequenceNumber
members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn
members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: name
members.description: The name of the custom entity.

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.name: account
members.description: Lookup to account.

members.name: activity
members.description: Unique identifier of the activity linked to the emission.

constantValues: Unique identifier of the activity linked to the emission.

members.name: activityentityname
members.description: Internal reference used to map an entity to the corresponding record.

constantValues: Internal reference used to map an entity to the corresponding record.

members.name: activityid
members.description: Internal reference used to map the entity to the corresponding record.

constantValues: Internal reference used to map the entity to the corresponding record.

members.name: activityname
members.description: Category or reference data used for reporting purposes and populated during the calculation process.

constantValues: Category or reference data used for reporting purposes and populated during the calculation process.

members.name: calculationdate
members.description: Date calculation occurred

members.name: category
members.description: Scope 3 category number.

members.name: ch4
members.description: The amount of the CH₄ factor.

constantValues: The amount of the CH₄ factor.

members.name: ch4unit
members.description: The unit for the CH₄ amount.

constantValues: The unit for the CH₄ amount.

members.name: co2
members.description: The amount of the CO₂ factor.

constantValues: The amount of the CO₂ factor.

members.name: co2e
members.description: The amount of the CO₂ equivalent factor.

constantValues: The amount of the CO₂ equivalent factor.

members.name: co2emt
members.description: The amount of the CO₂ equivalent factor in metric tons.

constantValues: The amount of the CO₂ equivalent factor in metric tons.

members.name: co2eunit
members.description: Unique identifier for the unit associated with the emission.

constantValues: Unique identifier for the unit associated with the emission.

members.name: co2unit
members.description: The unit for the CO₂ factor.

constantValues: The unit for the CO₂ factor.

members.name: consumptionenddate
members.description: End date of activity consumption.

members.name: consumptionstartdate
members.description: Start date of activity consumption.

members.name: countryisocode
members.description: The three letter ISO code of the country/region.

constantValues: The three letter ISO code of the country/region.

members.name: customdimension
members.description: Field where Custom Dimension values are stored in JSON format.

constantValues: Field where Custom Dimension values are stored in JSON format.

members.name: emissionsource
members.description: Emissions Source (Internal)

members.name: emissionsourcev2
members.description: Emissions source reference.

members.name: facilityid
members.description: Unique identifier for the facility associated with mobile combustion.

constantValues: Unique identifier for the facility associated with mobile combustion.

members.name: hfcs
members.description: The amount of hydrofluorocarbons factor.

members.name: hfcsunit
members.description: The unit for the hydrofluorocarbons factor.

constantValues: The unit for the hydrofluorocarbons factor.

members.name: isbiogenic
members.description: Indicates if it is a biogenic emission, or emission from a natural source.

constantValues: Indicates if it is a biogenic emission, or emission from a natural source.

members.name: ismarketbased
members.description: Indicates if emission calculation is market-based or considered a "net" calculation.

constantValues: Indicates if emission calculation is market-based or considered a "net" calculation.

members.name: latitude
members.description: This information can make it easier to submit reports for public disclosure.

constantValues: This information can make it easier to submit reports for public disclosure.

members.description: This information can make it easier to submit reports for public disclosure.

constantValues: This information can make it easier to submit reports for public disclosure.

constantValues: The amount of the N₂O factor.

members.description: Unique identifier for the unit associated with the emission.

constantValues: Unique identifier for the unit associated with the emission.

constantValues: The amount of nitrogen trifluoride factor.

members.name: nf3unit
members.description: The unit for the NF₃ factor.

constantValues: The unit for the NF₃ factor.

members.name: organizationalunitid
members.description: Unique identifier for the organizational unit associated with the emission.

constantValues: Unique identifier for the organizational unit associated with the emission.

members.name: product
members.description: A tangible or intangible item created through manufacturing, design, or development, intended for sale or use.

constantValues: A tangible or intangible item created through manufacturing, design, or development, intended for sale or use.

members.name: productidentifier
members.description: A unique alphanumeric code or number assigned to a specific product for the purpose of identification, tracking, and inventory management.

constantValues: A unique alphanumeric code or number assigned to a specific product for the purpose of identification, tracking, and inventory management.

members.name: scope
members.description: Emission scope as defined by the Greenhouse Gas Protocol.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'scope_display' is added to the 'Emission' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'scope'
supportingAttribute.name: scope_display

constantValues: Emission scope as defined by the Greenhouse Gas Protocol.

members.description: The amount of sulfur hexafluoride factor.

constantValues: The amount of sulfur hexafluoride factor.

members.description: The unit for SF₆ factor.

members.description: An optional identifier to correlate record with data origin.

constantValues: An optional identifier to correlate record with data origin.

members.name: transactiondate
members.description: Date associated with the actual date when the transaction occurred.

constantValues: Date associated with the actual date when the transaction occurred.
